timeline: Approximately 3-4 weeks after Chapter 5, after selling multiple batches to The Collector
location: Level 7 checkpoint, Dr. Yin's clinic in Sector 9, Jax's renovated apartment

knows: He has 400+ million credits in his account
Biometric scanners cannot be fooled by credentials or bribes
His DNA has special flags preventing level transition
Genetic rewrite would take years, cost 50+ billion, 70% mortality rate
The caste system is designed to be permanent across generations
He can never leave Level 9 through normal means
He has enough wealth to rebuild significant parts of the undercity
Property on Level 9 is extremely cheap
Station authority abandoned Level 9 decades ago
Jax Varro.emotional_state: Devastated, then enraged, then drugged, finally grimly determined - turning despair into purpose
Jax Varro.physical_state: Heavily intoxicated on pharmaceutical-grade Drift, coming down

knows: Jax tried to leave and failed
Jax is planning to rebuild Level 9 with his wealth
The plan is partially driven by Drift and desperation
Finn.emotional_state: Concerned for Jax, skeptical but supportive, committed to helping

revealed_to_reader: Jax now has 400+ million credits (sold multiple batches to The Collector)
Biometric scanners have secondary genetic locks preventing Gamma movement
Locks are embedded in mitochondrial DNA, passed down maternally
Genetic hacking to change caste would require: years of treatment, 50+ billion credits, 70% mortality rate
Complete genetic rewrite would be detected and carry automatic death sentence
Caste system was designed to be permanent across all future generations
Level 9 property is extremely cheap because no one wants to live there
Jax has upgraded his living space but is still trapped
Jax has been successful in selling to The Collector multiple times
The Free Level concept is born from desperation and rage
Jax plans to buy sectors and rebuild infrastructure

planted.element: The Free Level concept - free housing, food, medical care
planted.significance: Beginning of Jax's transformation from dealer to community leader
Specific properties that will become Free Level

planted.element: Station authority might not interfere if it looks like containment
planted.significance: Foreshadowing - they will interfere when it grows too much

planted.element: Jax's drug use escalating under stress
planted.significance: Character flaw that will continue throughout trilogy
Technical detail that will be important for Book 2 heist planning

planted.element: Jax's desire to prove Gammas are more than what they were engineered to be
planted.significance: Core thematic driver for entire trilogy

active_tensions: Jax's wealth versus his genetic imprisonment
Desire to escape versus impossibility of escape
Drug-fueled grandiose planning versus harsh reality
Station authority's potential response to Free Level
Jax's desperation and suicidal ideation versus newfound purpose
Whether the plan will work or just be a prettier cage
world_changes: Jax has decided to rebuild Level 9 instead of trying to escape
First property purchase planned (20-unit building in Sector 4)
The Free Level movement is conceived
